title: [LFT] Looking for Jungle, Mid and Top main Silver+
body: Looking for members to have fun while in games but also be serious, as active as possible and committed to training and practice as a team and see how far we can get. NOT LOOKING FOR SOMEONE TO JOIN JUST FOR A FEW GAMES. Must have a working Mic of some sort to communicate with. Add me to further discuss..  IGN: AT MrADC

replies.body: Can play any where needed play to play mid is best
Can play top, wide champion pool

Jungle main, Gold 5 peak but ended Silver 1 :(
Currently unranked because I haven't done promos. Can also support if needed, prefer jungle though :P

Jungle main, can also top and adc
gold  last season... silver 2 atm
mid lane main, pretty in depth knowledge of champions and counterplay, won't be on tonight but i should be tomorrow
